titleStmt.title: The safety of France to Monsieur the Dauphin. Or the secret history of the French king Proving to his son that there is no other way to secure France from approaching ruin, but by desposing his father for a tyrant and destroyer of his people. Done into English from the second edition of the French original printed in Holland. Licens'd and entred according to order.

The safety of France to Monsieur the Dauphin. Or the secret history of the French king Proving to his son that there is no other way to secure France from approaching ruin, but by desposing his father for a tyrant and destroyer of his people. Done into English from the second edition of the French original printed in Holland. Licens'd and entred according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Salusbury at the sign of the Temple near Temple Bar in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
